p: Antibiotics have been applied in agriculture and medicine for nearly 70 years. It has become very common contaminant in the environment. It is reported that the annual antibiotic consumption is around 0.21Â Mt in China [32]. Most of the antibiotics cannot be completely metabolized and go to the environment along with urine and feces. It can be in the form of matrix or metabolites, conjugates, or both. The application of antibiotics has resulted in hundreds of ARGs developed in the environment.
